EPISODE_TITLE: Pricing Psychology - Stop Undervaluing Your Work
GUEST_BIO: Nikko Hurtado is considered one of the most influential tattoo artists in the world, known for pioneering color realism and photorealistic portraits. With over 25 years in the industry, he owns Black Anchor Tattoo in Hesperia, California and has tattooed countless celebrities.

SHOW_SCRIPT.title: Show Open & Episode Overview
talkingPoints: Welcome to TattooNOW Weekly Show - Episode 2!
Special guest: Nikko Hurtado - Master of pricing strategy
SHOW_SCRIPT.presenterNotes: Energy: HIGH. Make strong eye contact. Emphasize how common underpricing is (most artists do it). Nikko is a legend - 25+ years, pioneered color realism. Build anticipation: 'If you've ever felt guilty charging what you're worth, this episode will change that.' Transition quickly to Problem ‚Üí Solution.
SHOW_SCRIPT.cue: CUE: Transition to Segment 1 after intro music (0:05)

SHOW_SCRIPT.title: Ad Break - TattooNOW Platform
SHOW_SCRIPT.presenterNotes: Read ad script naturally. Smile. Don't rush. Make eye contact during 'Book a demo' CTA.

SHOW_SCRIPT.title: The Pricing Mindset Shift
talkingPoints: Value vs. Time: You're not selling hours
Confidence pricing: Charge what you're worth
SHOW_SCRIPT.presenterNotes: Let Nikko lead here - he's experienced the full pricing journey from apprentice to celebrity artist. Ask: 'When did you realize you were undercharging?' Listen actively. Nod. React genuinely. If he mentions a specific turning point, dig deeper: 'What changed after that?' Keep energy conversational but focused. Goal: Help viewers see that underpricing hurts THEM and their CLIENTS (clients value what they pay for).
SHOW_SCRIPT.cue: CUE: Transition to education slides on pricing psychology (10:00)

SHOW_SCRIPT.title: Pricing Strategies That Work
talkingPoints: When to raise your prices (and how)
SHOW_SCRIPT.presenterNotes: This segment is tactical - viewers should leave with actionable steps. Ask Nikko: 'Walk us through your current pricing structure.' Let him explain his deposit system (likely 50% upfront). Emphasize that deposits are STANDARD in professional services (lawyers, contractors, etc.). Pause after each strategy to let it sink in. If you need to fill time, ask: 'What's the biggest pricing mistake you see artists making?' Clock check: You should be at ~20 minutes elapsed by end of this segment.

SHOW_SCRIPT.title: Ad Break - TattooNOW Website Builder
SHOW_SCRIPT.presenterNotes: Read ad copy. Emphasize 'Professional websites in minutes' - ties back to pricing confidence theme.

SHOW_SCRIPT.title: Handling Pricing Objections
talkingPoints: When to offer payment plans (and when not to)
SHOW_SCRIPT.presenterNotes: Role-play opportunity: 'Nikko, pretend I'm a client who just said your rate is too high. How do you respond?' Let him demonstrate objection handling in real-time. THIS is the gold content viewers will remember. After his response, add: 'Notice he didn't apologize or justify - he explained VALUE.' Emphasize that price objections are often VALUE objections in disguise. Ask: 'How do you qualify clients before discussing price?' Final 5 minutes: Open it up for any final pricing advice. Give Nikko space to share his biggest lesson.

SHOW_SCRIPT.title: Ad Break - TattooNOW Booking System
SHOW_SCRIPT.presenterNotes: Tie to deposits: 'Automate your bookings and collect deposits instantly.' Energy pickup for final segment.

SHOW_SCRIPT.title: Wrap-Up & Next Week Preview
talkingPoints: Action step: Audit your pricing THIS WEEK
Next week: Building a client network
SHOW_SCRIPT.presenterNotes: Energy: WARM but not rushed. Thank Nikko genuinely: 'Nikko, this was incredibly valuable - thank you for your honesty about pricing.' Action plan (speak directly to camera): (1) Write down your current rates, (2) Compare to your skill level and demand, (3) If you're undercharging, commit to raising prices by 20% for new clients starting next month. Mention next week's topic briefly. DISPLAY QR CODE during final CTA: 'If you want help implementing these pricing strategies, scan the QR code to book a free consultation.' Hold for 5 seconds. Sign off: 'Thanks for watching, and we'll see you next week!'
